Description:
DOWNSIZE TO BE CLOSE TO GOLF OR BOWLS
Looking to play a lot of Golf or Bowling and don't want too much to do at home? Well this unit might be the perfect downsizer for you to achieve your goal.
Or maybe you like the idea of buying an investment in an area where the prices have seen a great growth over the last 12 months of around 14.6% and you want to buy to be ahead of the future growth.
A short walk to the golf course or the bowling club means you can also fit in your exercise.
Never heard of Clifton Springs? A suburb that has taken a while to become known is now a suburb of choice for many offering all the amenities required for day to day living and playing.
Having lived here for over thirty years I have realised that even though it has grown it has not lost its historic appeal or peacefulness away from the hustle and bustle. You do not have to travel far to get groceries or visit the doctor or even ride your bike.
Insights: 1/6 Berrigan Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Stunning Family Retreat
Set on a spacious allotment and just a short stroll to the Clifton Springs Waterfront, this family home is a tempting combination of quality and style.
• 4 bedrooms with built in robes, master with walk in robe and full ensuite
• Relax in the formal lounge with bay windows for loads of natural light
• Open plan living and a separate rumpus room
• Stunning kitchen, ideal for the home chef
• Great undercover alfresco area, just in time for those summer BBQ's
• Double remote garage with internal access
• Private, enclosed backyard for the safety of children and pets. There's even a purpose built run, perfect for your cat to have some "outside time" in complete safety.
This home not only has a great family layout, it has space for everyone and is immaculately presented.
Insights: 11 Callisto Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Town House Living
Enjoy the summer days and nights in this immaculate 2 bedroom townhouse. 2 living areas, 2 bathrooms and views of the bay. 10 minute walk to beach and golf club. Upstairs is a well appointed kitchen, lounge, main bedroom and ensuite. Downstairs is a 2nd living area, 2nd bedroom and central bathroom. New carpets throughout, recently repainted, ducted gas heating and split system air conditioning make this in ideal spot for the young at heart. Outside is a single garage, and north facing private yard. An ideal place to spend your weekends or holidays away from the city. Great rental investment for future retirement.
Insights: 2 / 38 Maraboora Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Calling all Boaties & Caravanners!
Located in a quiet court with a high 2.7 metre double garage this is going to suit the big boat and/or caravan. With a courtyard style entry & welcoming verandah this home has street appeal.
On entry you are welcomed be the large open plan living space, from the large lounge to the the dining area & the kitchen with plenty of cupboards & wall oven. The floating timber floors are a highlight & there is easy access to the rear deck.
A slow combustion wood fire heater to add warmth to chilly winter days.
The bedroom wing with generous master bedroom & renovated ensuite is private to the rest of the house. The second & third bedrooms are serviced by the renovated central bathroom. With soft new carpet to walk on.
A fourth bedroom / hobbie room offers internal garage access.
The laundry is of super-sized proportions with a separate third toilet.
The garage also boasts 2.7 metre high roller door access to the back yard allowing greater off-street parking.
There is nearby parkland, easy walking to the foreshore & a short drive to the boat harbour.
There has been so much updating to this wonderful property, you'll just have to come see for yourself.
Insights: 7 Anembo Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
4 Bedroom Home on 777m2 Block
If you have been looking for the bigger block for your family or toys, then this is for you. Formal lounge and dining area plus family room. Well appointed galley-style kitchen. Spacious main bedroom with walk-in robe and full ensuite. Huge 10m x 5 mt covered outdoor entertaining deck that is nicely enclosed by roll-down blinds. Outside is a double garage with remote doors, plus parking space for the caravan, boat, or trailer. To the rear is room for the vegetable garden or kids trampoline and slide. Walking distance to the beach, golf and bowls club.
Insights: 33 Boonderabbi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A Life In View
Serene views of the water and You Yangs are calming highlights of this two storey home that makes the most of its elevated position in the peaceful surrounds of Clifton Springs. Hardwood flooring and generously sized spaces together with a huge open plan top level make this home the ultimate in relaxed family, coastal living.
A mature native garden cools the northerly sun from the master bedroom which is the first of four bedrooms on the ground floor. Plantation shutters add privacy and texture and the spacious walk in robe is matched with a stylish ensuite with large shower and wall width mirror. The other bedrooms are all of a generous size and have fitted wardrobes. At the end of the ground floor hall, a lounge room takes in the garden aspect and is a perfect kids zone. The nearby study situated next to the family bathroom would be an ideal home office or quiet sanctuary away from the noise and chaos! A large laundry with masses of storage and an internal access to the DLUG convenient additions.
Upstairs is where this home comes to life. Across a large space, the open plan living is anchored by a spacious kitchen that features dark stone benchtops, Ilve appliances, soft closing cupboards and drawers and plenty of storage. There’s a handy powder room on this level too and the dining and living spaces lead to the balcony, essentially an outdoor room. Fitted with roller screens from the roof, bbq’s here take in the awe inspiring views and provide a perfect retreat from hot days and maritime winds. Take in the shipping traffic with your morning cuppa!
Positioned in the heart of Clifton Springs, in a quiet family neighbourhood, this large home is close to all the action. Including solar panels, DLUG and heating and cooling, there is plenty of space to accommodate the family. Nearby beaches, premier golf clubs and shops are at your finger tips and there’s an easy commute to the city via the Portarlington - Melbourne ferry.
Insights: 59 Gwinganna Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
SWEEPING BAY VIEWS ON CORNER ALLOTMENT
Set on a magnificent 838m2 corner allotment is this classically built family home in sought after Clifton Springs. Upstairs enjoys a Master bedroom with beautiful double French doors leading out to the north facing balcony taking in the sweeping views of Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs, along with the large open plan family room with raked timber ceilings, dining and well-appointed kitchen all flowing onto the deck. A further 2 bedrooms, central bathroom, study and large formal north facing lounge room are downstairs along with ducted heating & ducted vacuum throughout, reverse cycle split system air conditioning & gas log fire upstairs for ambiance all working in harmony to complete the magnificent design for this grand family home. The dwelling has been strategically positioned on the block to have side access for boat or caravan storage, electric gates for security and access into the double garage which includes a separate purpose built hairdressing salon/ home office and a large yard facing Parrakoola Drive, giving the astute purchaser options to expand the property with further shedding should they wish. This is an opportunity not to be missed.
Insights: 40 Parrakoola Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 209-211 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
2 SEPARATE TITLES...1200+m2...Golf Course Access!!!
A golden opportunity has presented itself in the form of 2 SEPARATE TITLES in blue chip Clifton Springs! The allotment totaling approximately 1208m2 offers modest Bay views and backs straight onto the 9th hole of the Clifton Springs Golf Course. With the titles already in place and subdivision already completed this parcel opens up a multitude of options (STCA).
This brick veneer home is ready and waiting for its lucky buyer to add their own touches and to create their dream home, in a sought after location. Upon entry you are welcomed into a spacious and light filled living area, which also encompasses a large sunroom/4th bedroom. The fully equipped kitchen boasts electric cooktop and oven, dishwasher, large built-in-pantry and an abundance of cupboards. You're spoilt for choice when it comes to dining; as the home presents both a formal separate dining area and also a 2nd dining area which over-looks the kitchen. A large 2nd living is offered at the rear of the home, where you'll also find a spacious study. The oversized laundry with generous storage and separate toilet completes this wing of the home. Also on offer, are 3 spacious, light filled bedrooms with built-in-robes and the master with a full ensuite. A central bathroom services the remaining 2 bedrooms, complete with large vanity and combined shower/bath.
Wander outside where you will find an undercover entertaining area, established gardens, separate garden shed, single lock up garage and your very own access onto the Golf Club! More than enough room is on offer for all your toys - boats, caravans, trailers and everything in between!
With only minutes to the Dell, boat ramp, supermarkets, schools and all amenities on offer, don't pass up this rare opportunity.
Insights: 209-211 Country Club Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Canadian Haven
If you're looking for a unique entry level home with charm, character and history - Look no further! This split level home situated upon 585m2 with sweeping Bay view's offers more than meets the eye.
This sustainable Pan Abode' solid Red Cedar home hails all the way from Canada and is what dreams are made of! Upon entry you're welcomed into a spacious, light filled open living and dining area with large windows and unobstructed views across the Bay, Geelong and You Yangs. The fully equipped kitchen with electric cooking and built-in-pantry flows from the dining area.
Graced with raked ceilings throughout, large character windows and the everlasting warmth of the Canadian cedar makes this an inviting home from the moment of entry. 3 generous sized bedrooms equipped with built-in-robes, the master and 2nd bedroom encompassing the stunning Bay views. The central bathroom and laundry with outside access completes the upper level of the home.
Wander down stairs and here is where your imagination will truly run wild. Opportunities galore as the bottom level of the home offers a multitude of options. Comprising spacious second living with built-in bar, extra bedroom with walk-in-robe and study. This can be the ideal setup depending on your situation, a second occupancy with provisions to add in a kitchenette and bathroom (STCA), teenager's retreat or the perfect set up for a home office as the bottom level is equipped with separate access/private entry- the choice is yours!
The expansive grassed garden offers a studio, over-sized garden shed and further separate storage. With secure side access, there's plenty of space for boats, caravans and everything in between.
Located in a quiet pocket of Clifton Springs and only minutes to supermarkets, schools, public transport and all amenities on offer, you certainly won't ever forget this truly unique abode.
Insights: 9 Taronga Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Opulent Living With Panoramic Water Views
A luxurious family home all with practical living in mind. Boasting several separate living areas plus an open plan kitchen linking to the outdoor alfresco area, there is plenty of room for everyone to relish in this fabulous coastal residence. Beautifully maintained and cared for with high ceilings and plush carpets throughout, making you feel instantly at home. Set on a quiet cul-de-sac in coastal Clifton Springs, you’ll have everything at your fingertips, right in the heart of the Bellarine.
- This impressive residence truly makes the most of panoramic views of Geelong, Corio Bay and the You Yangs
- A landscaped tiered garden leads up to the front access, a stylish formal entrance to impress your guests
- Unpack the groceries with ease, practical entry to laundry/kitchen from the side driveway - all on one level
- Not one, but 2 DLUG for everyday use or securely lock up your pride & joy - be it a boat, bike or classic car
- Opulent open plan living on the lower level, forms the central family/entertaining hub of this home
- The kitchen is simply an entertainers dream - stone bench tops overlooking the spacious dining/lounge areas
- Featuring a 900mm oven, 5 gas burner-cooktop plus butler’s pantry with sink and gas cooktop
- An inviting lounge hosts a projector to create your own cinema experience or host friends for sporting events
- Enjoy al fresco dining and entertain friends on the timber deck, looking out to a tidy garden with apricot trees
- Large guest room with en suite and WIR on the first level, next to a formal lounge/billiard room with sea views
- Upstairs the third and fourth bedrooms are serviced by the third bathroom with bathtub and separate WC
- Master bedroom with balcony access, his & hers dressing rooms, en suite with deep bath & oversized shower
- Take in the glory of the sunsets in the upstairs lounge, with a large single window – you own unique view
- Unwind and relax by a natural gas log fire showcased in a stunning solid timber entertainment unit
- An open study or music room could also be made into a library with ample cupboard storage available
- Sophisticated heating and cooling systems throughout the home allow for comfort all year round
With close proximately to Clifton Springs shops, primary and secondary schools, now is the chance to make this house your family home for years to come, whilst enjoying every minute of it.

Address: 171 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Top Shelf!
A truly exclusive limited opportunity to secure 'top shelf' real estate within one of Clifton Springs' most highly sort after waterfront precincts. Commanding panoramic water views, an enviable land holding of approximately 720m2 within a stone's throw to the water's edge & an expansive quality home offering a myriad of living arrangements. Without a doubt this fine property 'nails the brief' for the buyer profile who wants to embrace the wonderful Bellarine Peninsula lifestyle; exceptional water views, the shoreline a short stroll away, enough room to accommodate the cars, boat & caravan, lovely established gardens & a significant residence to cater for family & friends.
- Upon entry the stairs will invite you to a warm & welcoming open plan living zone showcasing stunning timber flooring & a charming gas log fire. Expansive windows soak up an abundance of natural light & frame the deep blue vistas through the tree tops 'or' a classic Bellarine Peninsula sunset.
- A modernised kitchen is light & bright, great storage solutions, expansive benchtops & quality stainless steel appliances complete the picture.
- From the main living area dual glass sliding doors lead an expansive wrap around deck & provide a great vantage point to take in views of the of the You Yang's & the dazzling lights on the horizon.
- The main bathroom is generously sized & boasts a luxurious free standing bath which further endorses this fine property's quality.
- On inspection you will discover a clever & truly unique floor plan offering independent living upstairs v downstairs. The lower level possesses an independent entry, a spacious bedroom, powder room (with shower) & an oversized open plan living with kitchenette.
- I genuinely believe that this property's scope & versatility is it's distinct point of difference. Bedrooms & living areas of grand proportions & a flexible floor plan provides options a plenty; dual rental income potential, holiday let &/or personal use & so many more options only limited by ones imagination.
- A beautifully deep rear yard is one of the best & versatile in in today's property market; an impressive Camphor Laurel tree takes pride of place & provides lovely shade & privacy, additional shedding & secure boat/caravan accommodation via dual double gates (rear access). A further sheltered alfresco zone looks a great spot to host a BBQ and entertain guests.
Insights: 171 Bay Shore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Motivated To Sell!
Fantastic floor plan, this 4 bedroom brick veneer family home with retro aspects will delight you. The master bedroom has courtyard views, ceiling fan, built in robe & full ensuite. Light filled lounge is L shaped with a built in bar, gas log heater & reverse cycle split system. Open plan kitchen & dining is the central hub styled by slate floors, gas 4 burner cook top & electric wall oven with separate grill plus a dishwasher not to mention a plethora of storage. Bedrooms 2 & 3 both have built in robes. Bedroom 4 is large without robes which offers your options just ideal to be either another living, kid's rumpus or even a study. Central bathroom & toilet for easy access to these rooms. Brick feature walls throughout the home plus a second gas log heater. Outside you have it all, a great undercover pergola, private courtyard, plenty of lawns surrounded by low maintenance gardens. Also a double carport and a single car garage. Sitting pretty on a corner allotment of 599m2 with just a 700m stroll to the Clifton Springs golf course or to have a swim at the Dell! Just a few minutes' drive to the boat ramp, shops, cafes & supermarkets, not to mention the award winning Bellarine wineries.

Description:
Family Home on Large Block With Delightful Garden
At the top of a quiet Clifton Springs court, with just a glimpse of the distant You Yangs, this comfortable 3-bedroom home is blessed with a delightful mature garden on an unusually large north/south block. A front driveway delivers you to a double carport, and an elevated verandah protects the front door. Inside, an open plan lounge/dining/kitchen area greets you, and hints at the alfresco entertainment options via a sliding door to a large sunny deck. The well-equipped kitchen offers Euro-style appliances, a good-sized pantry, and plenty of bench space. While an adjacent second lounge/entertainment room overlooks the court. Down a short hallway is the laundry and 3 bedrooms - two with ensuite bathrooms. There are ceiling ducted-cooling vents throughout, plus two gas wall heaters and a split system AC in the dining area and AC in the studio, so year-round comfort is a given. Venturing outside to the deck and beyond, it’s clear that the cleverly terraced and landscaped back garden, with its winding paths and clipped hedgerows, shrubs, flowers, and mature trees - plus a paved courtyard, a covered pergola and an extra deck - offer multiple sites for outdoor dining and entertainment. Or simply enjoying the abundant flora, which boasts Silver Birches, Elms and Wisteria in flower. And tucked away in the far corner of the block is a private studio, complete with the comfort of a split system. A coastal lifestyle should be relaxed, comfortable, and full of entertaining distractions - and it’s all laid on here!
Insights: 8 Boodera Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Play in the Park, Walk to the Water
Located in a quiet part of Clifton Springs, 55 Dandarriga Drive is in the perfect place for a relaxed and carefree lifestyle.
Within easy walk of the waterfront and backing directly onto Malcolm Reserve, this home fits the bill for all, whether a first home buyer, investor or retiree.
Nestled amongst a beautiful garden setting this gorgeous home is a story book, consisting of two bedrooms and well-lit sun room, possibly doubling as a third bedroom or study, kitchen and living area are combined, along with a full-length veranda to catch the afternoon sun.
The North facing back yard backs on to reserve with no fear of buildings to the rear, and access to the rear yard is easily achievable for the boat or van if need be.
With 2 bathrooms, gas heating, gas hot water, and split system this home ticks a lot of boxes, with a land size of 698m² ample space for the kids to run amuck.
Inspection is a must if you are looking for that little gem.

Description:
DUAL OCCUPANCY 500M to the BAY & GOLF COURSE
A fantastic opportunity has presented itself of location, low maintenance, lifestyle AND the option of DUAL OCCUPANCY or an investment opportunity.
Situated upon 602m2 this home has had all the work completed. A total refurbish has been carried out meaning you can move in and enjoy! There are no extensive gardens to maintain or large backyards with lawns to mow with this property. This property offers a lifestyle where you can enjoy your surrounds and spending your weekends entertaining, relaxing and enjoying the best of the Bellarine.
Look at the location of the home, refer to the drone shot that we have listed. This is home is in a PRIME POSITION in a revered location. You are approximately 500m to the Golf Course and the Bay making Clifton Street one of the most sought-after streets to buy in!
The HOME, what's not to like? Everything has been done including refurbished kitchens, bathrooms, living areas. Simply add your own creative touches and enjoy. The floor plan is free flowing, the home is light filled and airy. It doesn't go on for miles and miles. It is a compact home that offers all the comfort you could hope for. The main living area with French doors out onto the expansive deck are the perfect location for you to enjoy a quaint outlook, glimpses of the bay and golf course and some truly stunning sun sets. Flowing from the main living area is the reading nook which oozes a sense of calm, the perfect spot to unwind. The designer kitchen is equipped with stone benchtops, new appliances (including a dishwasher and slide out pantry) and has ample cupboards and drawers, overlooking the dining area. Three large bedrooms are all equipped with built in robes, including drawers and shelving, the master with a walk-in robe and ensuite. The lavish main bathroom includes a free-standing bath whilst the decked-out laundry also provides good storage options. The study/5th bedroom complete the home's floor plan.
The BUNGALOW, this is the real BONUS and can serve a multitude of options depending on your situation. It's under the same roof line and matches the house so is pleasing to look at and blends in seamlessly with the main home. It has its own separate entry and front garden and is surprisingly spacious when you walk through it. It is equipped with a full kitchen, dining/living, generous bedroom, bathroom and European laundry with sliding door access to the back yard. IDEAL for an elderly parent, teenagers or as an investment. The choice is yours!
FEATURES of the home include ducted heating and cooling, quality fittings and fixtures, 5kw solar system (20 panels), custom light fittings, window furnishings (including plantation shutters) and double carport. The front yard is manicured and well-kept, looking beautiful all year round. The back garden is a is a true oasis complete with an in-ground, salt chlorinated and self-maintaining pool, five-person spa, designated undercover BBQ area and plenty of room for sun lounges.
This home SCREAMS lifestyle and opportunity! If you are looking for that coastal Bellarine home where you can just ENJOY, then put Clifton Street at the top of your list!
Insights: 34 Clifton Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Clifton Springs Charm!
Character filled and boasting unrivalled size, scale and scope presents an outstanding buying opportunity on the booming Bellarine Peninsula; enter 6 Adina Way, Clifton Springs.
• Sitting proudly from its elevated site this fine property will not doubt catch your eye but it will be its warm, welcoming 'home' feel that will truly capture your attention
• Boasting an enviable 5 bedrooms and a flexible floor plan; this property delivers a build which can cater for a myriad of living arrangements.
• Light filled spacious living zones further enhance this properties unique standing in the market place.
• The kitchen serves up a great practical space for the chef of the household; great storage solutions and stainless steel appliances complete the picture
• A northerly rear aspect ensures the main living area is bathed in natural light; a glass sliding door provides a lovely connection to an impressive decked alfresco zone (complete with heat strip and ceiling fan)
• A double garage and further off street car options provide further conveniences and support the needs of a true Bellarine lifestyle
• Equipped with all the modern comforts this property represents a true 'turn key and start enjoying' from day 1
• A generous corner allotment (588m2 approx.) showcases options a plenty; double gates provide rear access for the boat, caravan and/or Jet Ski.
• Clever build placement ensures a generous secure rear yard (colourbond perimeter fencing) and further scope to evolve to your individual needs.
• A second to none location; rolling green pastures directly opposite, the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp just down the road and close to schools, shops and local amenities.
• This property represents a great opportunity to secure a great home for today and excellent property investment for the future.

Description:
Spacious Family Home On Over 1,500sqm Block With Stunning Views!
Sweeping views of the You Yangs and Corio Bay with plenty of outdoor space for the kids makes this 5 bedroom family home a rare find. Utilising a double block, privacy and space are highlights. Imagine your evenings taking in the views from the elevated spa deck whilst the kids run free on the expansive lawn and swim in the pool, this is a forever family home.
Through a large portico, the welcoming entry leads to a split level spacious formal living room. The minute you’re in this home, the views come to life and you’re led to the deck which opens onto the dining area and looks through to the well appointed galley style kitchen. Stainless steel SMEG appliances sit atop caesarstone benchtops finished with a glass splashback. A generous walk in pantry is ideal for family storage. Timber flooring throughout adds casual and low maintenance style and timber raked ceiling add a spacious feel. Featuring a walk through dressing room and ensuite, the master bedroom sits at the front of the house and the remaining three bedrooms, all with BIRs are located at the other end of the property overlooking the garden. The family bathroom has a large double vanity, shower and bath with a separate toilet and in a clever design, is accessible from the spa deck via the tiled laundry. Extra accommodation is available thanks to a separate private, self contained unit that could be a teenagers retreat or playroom and has rental potential.
Climate controlled by ducted heating and evaporative cooling, this home also includes ceiling fans and plenty of storage. A DLUG provides parking or storage for vehicles and the large driveway and side access to the property is perfect for storing the caravan or dream boat.Situated in an elevated area of Clifton Springs, the property is close to beaches, schools and the Portarlington- Melbourne ferry. This large home and block offers plenty of potential for family’s keen to make use of this coastal location and could present a development opportunity (STCA) for investors keen to draw on the popularity of this region.
Insights: 38-40 Coolangatta Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Tranquil Retreat
This is your opportunity to secure a fully refurbished home, without a finger to lift. Set over 2 levels, offering Bay Views, brand new fittings and fixtures set upon a generous 596m2 block which poses an opportunity for subdivision (STCA) - Prepare to be impressed!
Set behind a gated fence with a huge secure front yard, the sense of tranquility and privacy is immediate. Upon entry you are greeted by the formal light-filled lounge room, offering built in cabinetry, split-system, gas log feature fire and sliding doors to the outdoor area. A spacious dining area leads into the fully revamped kitchen, offering brand new SS appliances, dishwasher, gas cooktop, electric oven, pantry, additional built-in shelves and ample cupboards. 3 spacious bedrooms also occupy the bottom level, all with built-in robes. The central bathroom, separate toilet and large laundry with outdoor access complete the ground level of the home.
Float upstairs and this is where you are going to be truly amazed! With the You Yang's and Corio Bay as your backdrop, the large open space can either be used as an extraordinary 4th bedroom or 2nd living area - the choice is yours! Serviced by a walk-in-robe, powder room, split-system and sliding doors out onto the balcony, this top level offers the true wow factor and a multitude of options.
Other features of the home include - New floor and window furnishings, freshly painted throughout, LED down-lights, garden shed and more than enough room for cars, boats, caravans and everything in between!
Located in a quiet pocket of Clifton Springs, with all schools, amenities, public transport and everything Clifton Springs and Drysdale has to offer only a short drive away - The best of the Bellarine is waiting for you.
Insights: 12 Almerta Ave, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Compact, Convenient and Contemporary
A home oozing luxury and comfort - Don't wait long as this surprise package is sure to impress and will not last!
Upon entry you're greeted with a sun drenched, free flowing upper level. The generously sized living/dining area is equipped with split system heating/cooling, custom light fittings and large sliding doors that open out on to a full length balcony with Bay views. The kitchen overlooking the dining and living is furnished with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, 900mm gas cooktop and oven, with ample cupboard space. The spacious master bedroom hosts a full ensuite and walk-in-robe which completes the upper level of the home.
Central stairs flow to the ground level where you will find the second living area, second bedroom with built-in-robes, large light filled bathroom, laundry with outdoor access complete with internal access to the single lock up garage.
Set upon 396m2 this secluded corner block is shielded by secure fences and shrubbery allowing you to entertain in privacy. The wow factor is really set with the outdoor entertaining areas; the current owners have utilised every inch of space to produce a truly enviable outdoor area. You will find multiple sitting areas Including an undercover outdoor dining area equipped with a ceiling fan and café blinds allowing you to entertain all year round with ease. A large lush lawn space, surrounded by manicured fruit trees and two separate decked areas really make this the ideal entertainer's paradise!
Whether you are looking to downsize, invest in our lucrative market or are in need of a dual occupancy type set up then 28 Gange Place may just be for you.
Other features of the home include ducted heating, split system cooling, surround sound speakers in the 2nd living area, Tasmanian Oak flooring, generous under-stair storage, water tanks, and garden shed, all while being located in a gorgeous, uninterrupted pocket of Clifton Springs. All amenities, shops, transport, schools and everything the Bellarine has to offer at your finger-tips - Why would you live anywhere else?!
Insights: 28 Gange Place, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
